meanings.definition: In a manner that indicates the internal content or qualities of something.
meanings.sent1: She intensionally focused on the details of the painting.
meanings.sent2: He intensionally examined the ingredients of the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The detective intensionally searched for clues in the mysterious room.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes intensionally scanned the room, taking in every detail.
meanings.sent5: The scientist intensionally studied the structure of the molecule under the microscope.

meanings.sent1: He intensionally chose the path less traveled.
meanings.sent2: She intensionally practiced the piano every day to improve.
meanings.sent3: The cat intensionally knocked over the vase to get attention.
meanings.sent4: The athlete intensionally focused on his breathing during the race.
meanings.sent5: The student intensionally listened to the lecture to understand the concept better.
